entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is addressing Dumbledore with a piercing stare, indicating that she is anxious to discuss something with him.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: McGonagall is described as shooting a sharp look at Dumbledore and expressing her anxiety to discuss the real reason for Dumbledore's disappearance.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is mentioned as someone who complimented Harry on his new earmuffs.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as turning up in Godric's Hollow to find the Potters.

entities.name: potters
entities.description: The Potters are mentioned as being targeted by Voldemort.

entities.name: godric's hollow
entities.description: Godric's Hollow is the location where Voldemort turned up to find the Potters.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as turning up in Godric's Hollow to find the Potters.

relationships.description: McGonagall is questioning Dumbledore about the rumors surrounding his disappearance.
Voldemort turned up in Godric's Hollow to find the Potters.
